description: Sticky yakitori chicken skewers work perfectly with crunchy and fresh Japanese slaw.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Tree nut free,Egg free,Chicken,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Chicken Yakitori with Japanese Slaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large carrot (peeled and sliced into matchsticks)

recipeInstructions.text: Soak 4 skewers in water. Place the soy sauce, mirin, half of the rice wine vinegar and most of the honey (reserve a teaspoon) in a small saucepan on medium heat and cook for 810 minutes until reduced slightly.

Thread the skewers with chicken and half of the spring onions and heat a griddle pan on medium heat. Place the chicken skewers in the pan, brush well with the sauce and cook for 10 minutes, turning occasionally and brushing on more sauce.

Slice the remaining spring onions into matchsticks, add to a medium bowl with the carrots, radishes and cabbage, whisk together the remaining rice wine vinegar and honey, pour over the vegetables and toss to coat.
